column1: beta - gal and PLAP activities in whole mount embryos and retinal sections were detected, respectively, by incubation with 5 - bromo - 4 - chloro - 3 - indolyl beta - D - galactopyranoside and AP staining buffer ( 0. 1 mg / ml 5 - bromo - 4 - chloro - 3 - indolyl phosphate, 1 mg / ml nitroblue tetrazolium in 100 mM Tris - HCl ( pH 9. 5), 100 mM NaCl, 5 mM MgCl2) as described elsewhere [ 67, 68].

After hybridization, sections were washed with a solution containing 5 x SSC and 10 mM dithiothreitol at 50 degrees C for 30 min, incubated in a solution containing 50% formamide, 2 x SSC, and 10 mM dithiothreitol at 65 degrees C for 30 min, treated in a solution containing 10 mu g / ml RNase A in TNE [ 0. 01 M Tris buffer ( pH 7. 6), 0. 5 M sodium chloride, and 0. 001 M EDTA] at 37 degrees C for 30 min and then washed with 50% formamide, 2 x SSC, and 10 mM dithiothreitol at 65 degrees C for an additional 30 min followed by two washes with 2 x SSC / 10 mM dithiothreitol at 65 degrees C for 30 min, and 0. 1 x SSC / 10 mM dithiothreitol at 65 degrees C for 30 min.
